biotools.summary: COMSUC web server for identification of COnsensus Molecular SUbtype of Cancer allows users to identify Consensus Molecular Subtypes (CMS) by integrating multiple clustering results based on multiple platform, multiple omics data and multiple methods. The COMSUC web server has the goal of fusion, clustering and interactive visualization of multi-omics data for patient samples.
